name: multi-language-dev-containers
description: Multi-language development environment with VS Code DevContainers

scripts.network:china: npm run docker:china && npm run github:china
scripts.network:global: npm run docker:global && npm run github:global
scripts.build:base: cd .devcontainer && (docker compose build base || docker-compose build base)
scripts.python: cd .devcontainer && (docker compose run --rm python zsh || docker-compose run --rm python zsh)
scripts.typescript: cd .devcontainer && (docker compose run --rm typescript zsh || docker-compose run --rm typescript zsh)
scripts.texlive: cd .devcontainer && (docker compose run --rm texlive zsh || docker-compose run --rm texlive zsh)
scripts.mcp: cd .devcontainer && (docker compose run --rm mcp zsh || docker-compose run --rm mcp zsh)
